metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8675 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The get_vlc2 function in get_bits.h in Libav before 11.9 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash)via a crafted mp3 file, possibly related to startcode sequences during m4vdetection.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
